scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p fonts && mkdir -p icons && cp ./node_modules/pearson-elements/dist/fonts/* ./fonts && cp ./node_modules/pearson-elements/dist/icons/* ./icons && cp -R ./node_modules/@pearson-components/app-header/images ./
scripts.delete-assets: find . -type f -name '*.css' -delete && find . -type f -name 'dist*.js' -delete && find . -type f -name 'dev*.js' -delete && find . -type f -name 'event*.js' -delete && rm -rf ./images
